channel.title: Non Router
channel.description:
My friend wants to put up his server but........ he has no router
I know with a plain modem you should be able to connect right into it
but it is not working
he said he can join it by putting iin the no-ip ip but i tried joining but it did not work
he set the firewall and made a no-ip
any more things to do?

item.title: Non Router
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

doesnt seem like it worked =\

and wait does that mean he does not need a no-ip or what?

since he has no router

Read full topic

item.title: Non Router
item.dc:creator: @gagea2 gagea2
item.description:
@gagea2 wrote:

disable all virus blockers. and he dont have to portfoward
